meanings.definition: Preventing or countering interference in communication or navigation systems.
meanings.sent1: The antijamming technology ensured clear communication during the mission.
meanings.sent2: The antijamming feature on the radar system helped avoid signal disruptions.
meanings.sent3: The antijamming solution made sure the signals weren't playing hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her focus was an antijamming force against distractions, like a shield against chaos.
meanings.sent5: The antijamming capability of the new equipment was like a superhero protecting the signals.

meanings.definition: A device or technology designed to prevent or counteract jamming.
meanings.sent1: The military invested in advanced antijamming devices for secure communication.
meanings.sent2: The antijamming tool effectively blocked any attempts to disrupt the signal.
meanings.sent3: The antijamming gadget was like a silent guardian against signal interference.
meanings.sent4: The antijamming equipment stood as a fortress against signal intruders.
meanings.sent5: The antijamming device was the key to maintaining clear communication in the area.

meanings.definition: The act of protecting against interference or disruption caused by jamming.
meanings.sent1: The antijamming of the system was crucial for uninterrupted communication.
meanings.sent2: The successful antijamming during the operation ensured smooth navigation.
meanings.sent3: The team's antijamming efforts turned the interference into a harmless dance party.
meanings.sent4: Their unity acted as an antijamming force against any disruptions.
meanings.sent5: The constant vigilance was the ultimate antijamming strategy against signal disturbances.
